preference.name: query
preference.value: SELECT @pretty_title, @status, @last_update_date, @submitted_by FROM @project = 'self' WHERE @status = OPEN() ORDER BY @last_update_date DESC

preference.name: query
preference.value: SELECT @pretty_title, @status, @last_update_date, @submitted_by FROM @project = 'self' WHERE @status = OPEN() AND @assigned_to = MYSELF() ORDER BY @last_update_date DESC
